titleStmt.title: The life of the glorious bishop S. Patricke apostle and primate of Ireland Togeather with the lives of the holy virgin S. Bridgit and of the glorious abbot Saint Columbe patrons of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Jocelin, fl. 1200.
Rochford, Robert.
Cogitosus, Saint. Vitae Sanctae Brigidae virginis. aut
Capgrave, John, 1393-1464. Lyfe of Seynt Birgette.
Adamnan, Saint, 625?-704. Vita S. Columbae. English & Latin.

notesStmt.note: "The life of the holy virgin Saint Brigit patronesse of Ireland" and "The life of the glorious abbot S. Columbe the great" have caption title.

Life of St. Patrick is abridged from the Latin of Jocelin; life of St. Bridget is translated partly from Cogitosus and partly from Capgrave; life of St. Columba is abridged from the Latin of S. Adamanus.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
